name: Cooldown Tanks
description:
Cooldown Tanks is the first prototype I ever made using Unity!

I decided to upload it because I had a lot of fun playing it with friends, sharing the same keyboard, shouting and laughing, so I thought maybe someone else would want to try it and have a good time.

The main mechanics are the intentionally clunky controls of the tank and the increasing cooldown, each time you shoot the cooldown time for future shots is increased.

Controls:

Player1:   WASD - Move Tank      F - Shoot

Player2:   Arrow Keys - Move Tank     Right Shift - Shoot

R - Restart
